title: Verify: Selecting 120 Sports successfully opens the 120 Sports app
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has setup their Apple TV device
AND the "120 Sports" app is present in the device Apple TV Menu
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects 120 Sports from the Apple TV menu
custom_expected: THEN the 120 Sports Live app will open successfully

title: Verify: 120 Sports can be accessed while the Apple TV is connected wirelessly
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has setup their Apple TV device
AND the Apple TV device is currently connected to a wireless network
AND 120 Sports is present in the device Apple TV Menu
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects 120 Sports from the Apple TV menu
custom_expected: THEN 120 Sports will open successfully

title: Verify: 120 Sports can be accessed while the Apple TV is connected using a wired connection
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has setup their Apple TV device
AND the Apple TV device is currently connected to a wired network connection
AND the "120 Sports" app is present in the device Apple TV Menu
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects 120 Sports from the Apple TV menu
custom_expected: THEN the 120 Sports will open successfully

title: Home: Verify when 120 Sports is accessed the user lands on the Home screen (first launch)
custom_preconds: GIVEN the "120 Sports" app is present in the device Apple TV Menu
custom_steps: WHEN "120 Sports" is accessed
custom_expected:
THEN the user will be brought to the Home Screen
AND the Home screen will display:
 Featured (only 5 display)
 Top Stories
 Most Recent 
 sports carousel
AND the assets are able to be scrolled through
AND the assets are selectable/playable

title: Home: Verify Top Nav Bar options when 120 Sports is accessed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the "120 Sports" application is present
AND the user has accessed the app
custom_steps: WHEN the user accesses the main menu page
custom_expected:
THEN the following options will be listed at the top of the screen: (in the following order left to right)

120 Sports 
Most Recent
Top Stories
Search
Settings

title: Verify Home shelves: order, text and formatting are correct, clear and readable
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the "120 Sports" application is present
AND the user accesses the app
custom_steps:
WHEN the user traverses the Home Screen options: (in the following order top to bottom)

120 Sports - Featured Marquee
Top Stories
Most Recent
Sports
custom_expected:
THEN all text will be formatted correctly
AND all thumbnails will appear without issue

title: Verify Home shelves: Activation
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the "120 Sports" application is present
AND we access the app
custom_steps:
WHEN the user traverses the Home Screen options: (in the following order top to bottom)

Featured Marquee
Timeline
Catch-Up
Search
Settings


AND in each we activate at least one thumb  from each section
custom_expected: THEN the User lands on expected full screen playback

title: 120 Sports Featured Marquee Carousel - Navigation
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the 120 Sports Channel has been accessed
AND the 120 Sports tab in the top Nav bar has been selected
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects the 120 Sports Carousel
AND navigates through the Content File Thumbs
custom_expected:
THEN the Carousel displays the 120 Sports Items as expected 
AND each can be selected

title: Timeline Featured Carousel - Navigation
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the 120 Sports Channel has been accessed
AND the Most Recent in the top Nav bar has been selected
custom_steps:
WHEN the user land in Most Recent carousel
AND navigates through the Most Recent carousel
custom_expected:
THEN the Carousel displays the Most Recent as expected 
AND each can be selected

title: Top Stories Featured Carousel - Navigation
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the 120 Sports Channel has been accessed
AND the Top Stories tab in the top Nav bar has been selected
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects the Top Stories Carousel
AND navigates through the Top Stories
custom_expected:
THEN the Carousel displays the Top Stories Items as expected 
AND each can be selected

title: Trending Featured Carousel - Navigation
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the 120 Sports Channel has been accessed
AND the Top Stories Carousel has been selected
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects the Top Stories Carousel
AND navigates through the Content File Thumbs
custom_expected:
THEN the Carousel displays the Top Stories Items as expected 
AND each can be selected

title: Sports Featured Carousel - Navigation
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the 120 Sports Channel has been accessed
AND the "Search" tab in the top Nav bar has been acivated
custom_steps:
WHEN The user lands on the "Search" page
AND   When user navigates to on screen keyboard
AND   Activates a letter
custom_expected:
THEN  The search page will display "Search" text centered on top
AND   "Search For:" text box is empty 
AND   Focus is defaulted to text box
AND   Letters populate text field when activated

title: Ads trigger - Pre-Roll Ads
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the 120 Sports Channel has been accessed
AND ANY piece of VOD content found within the has been selected to PLAY
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects Any Carousel that contains VOD Assets
AND navigates through the Content File Thumbs for VOD assets
THEN presses select to ENTER and PLAY the media content
custom_expected: VOD Asset must Show Freewheel served pre-roll video ads to user before VOD clip begins

title: Settings: Verify categories displayed in Settings menu
custom_preconds:
Given the 120 Sports channel is accessed
And the device is connected to the internet via Wireless connection or Wired Connection
custom_steps: When the Settings menu is activated
custom_expected:
Then the following categories are displayed in the Settings menu: 

About 120
Terms of Use
Privacy Policy
Auto-advance

title: Settings: Verify selecting Terms of Use opens the Terms of Use page
custom_preconds: Given the 120 Sports channel has been accessed
custom_steps:
When the Settings menu has been opened
And the Terms of Use section has been activated
custom_expected: Then the Terms of Use screen is displayed

title: Settings: Verify backing out of the Terms of Use screen via the Menu button returns the app to the Settings page
custom_preconds:
Given the 120 Sports Channel has been accessed 
And the Settings menu has been activated
And the Terms of Use menu has been selected taking the app to the Terms of Use screen
custom_steps: When the Menu button is pressed
custom_expected: Then the app returns to the Settings menu with the Terms of Use selection highlighted.

title: Settings: Verify selecting Privacy Policy opens the Privacy Policy page
custom_preconds: Given the 120 Sports channel has been accessed
custom_steps:
When the Settings menu has been opened
And the Privacy Policy section has been accessed
custom_expected: Then the Privacy Policy page will open.

title: Settings: Verify selecting Auto-advance toggling works as intended
custom_preconds: Given the 120 Sports Channel has been accessed
custom_steps:
When the Settings menu is activated
And the Auto-advance feature has been selected.
custom_expected: The Auto-advance selection descriptor (check mark) is displayed.

title: Settings: Verify selecting Auto-advance feature is working as intended
custom_preconds:
Given the 120 Sports channel has been accessed
And the Settings menu has been opened
And the Auto-advance has been activated directing the app to Auto-advance
custom_steps: When the Auto-advance text is highlighted press the select button to toggle the feature "ON" (check mark appears)
custom_expected: When the app is returned to Live broadcast, VOD asset or Collection (Timeline or Catchup) content will Auto-advance

title: Search: Verify Selecting Search opens the Search Page
custom_preconds: Given the 120 Sports Channel has been accessed
custom_steps: When the Search tab in the top Nav bar has been selected.
custom_expected:
The Search Menu opens up containing: 
- the word SEARCH appears in the top center of the screen.
- the keyboard on the left side of the screen appears.  
- A cursor appears in the Search For box
- The "a" character is highlighted on the keyboard

title: Search: Verify that as letters are typed search results are auto suggested
custom_preconds:
Given that the 120 Sports channel has been accessed
And the Search menu has been activated
custom_steps: When characters are inputted in the Search For field
custom_expected:
Then suggested results will appear in the right hand window
And these results will be grouped via category including (but not limited to):
-Live broadcast
-VOD assets
-Collection (Timeline or Catchup)
etc.

title: Search: Verify that when CLEAR is selected search terms disappear from the screen
custom_preconds:
Given that the PGA Tour Live channel has been accessed
And the Search menu has been activated
And a search query has returned valid results
custom_steps: When the CLEAR button has been activated
custom_expected:
All of the search results have been removed from the screen. 
And the SEARCH FOR is empty save for a blinking cursor.

title: Wired Connection: Launch and playback
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have the Apple TV connected to a wired network connection
AND we have accessed the "120 Sports" Channel
custom_steps:
WHEN we locate a video feed
AND we attempt to play this
custom_expected:
THEN the video stream will launch successfully
AND the feed will play without issue

title: Wireless Connection: Launch and playback
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have the Apple TV connected to a wireless network connection
AND we have accessed the "120 Sports" Channel
custom_steps:
WHEN we locate a video feed
AND we attempt to play this
custom_expected:
THEN the video stream will launch successfully
AND the feed will play without issue

title: Launch to Fullscreen - First View
custom_preconds:
GIVEN we have the Apple TV connected to a network 
AND we have accessed the "120 Sports" Channel
custom_steps:
WHEN we locate a video feed we have not yet viewed
AND we attempt to play this
custom_expected:
THEN the video playback will launch
AND the playback will be full screen

title: Video Player UI - Appearance and Timeout
custom_preconds: GIVEN we have accessed the "120 Sports" Channel
custom_steps:
WHEN we launch a video feed
AND we tap any button
custom_expected:
THEN the Play Controls overlay the video playback at launch
AND after 15 seconds they disappear
AND tapping any button again will repeat the appearing function
AND after 15 seconds they disappear

title: Video Player UI - Functionality
custom_preconds: GIVEN we have accessed the "120 Sports" Channel
custom_steps:
WHEN we launch a video feed
AND we tap Up
AND the Player Controls overlay appears
AND the we attempt these displayed controls
custom_expected:
THEN the controls will function as displayed (Apple TV standard player):

- In standard UI the Right and Left activation ramp SEEK FWD/BACK up to 3 speeds
- Holding down the ATV Remote's SELECT button pauses playback jumps to More Options Menu (CC where available)

title: Functionality: Play Button
custom_preconds: GIVEN we have accessed the "120 Sports" Channel
custom_steps:
WHEN a video content file is highlighted
AND we press play on the Apple TV remote control
custom_expected: THEN the Apple TV standard player will kick to Playback (Live/VOD)

title: Full Linear Playback to Exit
custom_preconds: GIVEN we have accessed the "120 Sports" Channel
custom_steps:
WHEN we launch a video feed with a TRT > 2mins
AND watch to completion
custom_expected:
THEN playback will commence and continue without stalls or skips
AND the user will not be kicked out of the stream unexpectedly
AND upon completion the app will return to launch (asset) page

title: Seek FWD to Exit
custom_preconds: GIVEN we have accessed the "120 Sports" Channel
custom_steps:
WHEN we launch a video feed
AND seek to tail of video
custom_expected: THEN the app will transition from playback and return to launch (asset) page gracefully

title: Seek BACK (RWD) to Head of Program
custom_preconds: GIVEN we have accessed the "120 Sports" Channel
custom_steps:
WHEN we launch a video feed
AND seek FWD > 10 mins into program
AND allow > 30 secs of playback
AND seek BACK (RWD) to head of program
custom_expected: THEN the app will resume playback from beginning and continue without issue

title: Network: Verify bandwidth/stream quality adapts with network fluctuations
Network: Verify video quality improves with connectivity improvement
Network: Verify when throttling connection strength that bitrate playback adjusts without issue in both directions
Video Playback: Wired Connection Lost ***
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a Video Stream is successfully playing full screen
AND the Apple TV device is connected to a wired network connection
custom_steps: WHEN we disconnect the LAN from the wall
custom_expected:
THEN the expected fail message appears
AND (BL to add additional expectations)

custom_preconds:
GIVEN a Video Stream is successfully playing full screen
AND the Apple TV device is connected to an Ad Hoc wifi network
custom_steps: WHEN we turn off the Ad Hoc wifi network
custom_expected:
THEN the expected fail message appears
AND (BL to add additional expectations)

title: Video Playback: Wireless Connection - No Data (Blocked) ***
custom_steps: (BL to explore possibility of ATV/Proxy network setup and set up test scenario when data is choked)

custom_preconds:
GIVEN we are navigating through the App's static pages 
AND the Apple TV device is connected to a wired network connection
custom_steps: WHEN we disconnect the LAN from the wall
custom_expected:
THEN the expected fail message appears
AND (BL to add additional expectations)

custom_preconds:
GIVEN we are navigating through the App's static pages 
AND the Apple TV device is connected to an Ad Hoc wifi network
custom_steps: WHEN we turn off the Ad Hoc wifi network
custom_expected:
THEN the expected fail message appears
AND (BL to add additional expectations)

title: App Pages: Wireless Connection - No Data (Blocked) ***
custom_steps: (BL to explore possibility of ATV/Proxy network setup and set up test scenario when data is choked)
